perturbation.original_text: You agree to establish the Franchised Business and have it open and in operation within six (6) months after the Effective Date of this Agreement. Time is of the essence.
perturbation.changed_text: You agree to establish the Franchised Business and have it open and in operation within two (2) months after the Effective Date of this Agreement. Time is of the essence.
perturbation.explanation: This modification reduces the allowable time for establishing the franchise from six months to two months, potentially conflicting with state laws that require franchisors to provide franchisees with a reasonable time to establish their business. Shorter timeframes can be deemed unreasonable, especially considering the complexities involved in site selection, permitting, and construction.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State franchise laws regarding reasonable time for establishment

perturbation.original_text: You agree to give us written notice of your choice to renew at least six (6) months before the end of the term of this Agreement (but not more than nine (9) months before the term expires).
perturbation.changed_text: You agree to give us written notice of your choice to renew at least two (2) months before the end of the term of this Agreement (but not more than three (3) months before the term expires).
perturbation.explanation: This change reduces the required notice period for renewal from six months to two months, potentially violating state franchise laws that mandate a reasonable notice period. A shorter timeframe may not provide the franchisee adequate time to assess their business performance, negotiate renewal terms, or seek legal counsel, especially for significant investments or personal circumstances.
perturbation.contradicted_law: State franchise laws regarding reasonable renewal notice periods

perturbation.original_text: Before starting any activities or operations under this Agreement, you agree to procure and maintain in full force and effect during the term of this Agreement (and for such period thereafter as is necessary to provide the coverages required under this Agreement for events having occurred during the Term of this Agreement), at your expense, at least the following insurance policy or policies in connection with the Franchised Business or other facilities on premises, or by reason of the construction, operation, or occupancy of the Franchised Business or other facilities on premises.
perturbation.changed_text: Before starting any activities or operations under this Agreement, you agree to procure and maintain in full force and effect for thirty days (30) at your expense, insurance policies in connection with the Franchised Business or other facilities on premises, or by reason of the construction, operation, or occupancy of the Franchised Business or other facilities on premises.
perturbation.explanation: This modification significantly reduces the required insurance coverage period from the entire term of the agreement to a mere 30 days.  This conflicts with standard business practices and legal requirements that mandate ongoing insurance coverage for liability, property damage, and other potential risks associated with operating a business. This brief coverage period introduces significant legal and financial vulnerability for both the franchisee and potentially the franchisor.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Standard business insurance requirements and potential violation of state laws mandating ongoing coverage
